name: Splinter Drake
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 15

traits.name: Land’s Stride
traits.desc: Moving through nonmagical difficult terrain costs the splinter drake no extra movement, and it can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The splinter drake makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Thorn Volley (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The splinter drake emits a spray of thorns in a 40-foot cone. Creatures within this area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage and 28 (8d6) poison damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful saving throw.
